reviews.text: Please implement exponential backoff logic (1s, 2s, 4s, up to 5 attempts) for all failed payment webhook deliveries.
reviews.reason_text: Implementing backoff logic ensures reliable retries.

reviews.text: Each retry must verify the HMAC-SHA256 signature header to ensure authenticity before processing.
Every attempt, regardless of outcome, should be logged in the webhook_retry_history table with the status (success/failure) and corresponding response code.
reviews.reason_text: Logging attempts enforces consistent error reporting.

reviews.text: Additionally, the delivery process must meet an SLA of achieving successful delivery within 2 minutes at the 95th percentile (P95).
reviews.reason_text: SLA for successful delivery within time.

reviews.text: Kindly provide the expected Go-live date for this change and share a testing sandbox URL so we can validate the implementation before launch.
reviews.reason_text: Requesting dates and URLs is not enforceable.
